title: Did General Douglas MacArthur Predict an Interplanetary War?
subtitle: The WWII icon alluded to the possibility that mankind might someday face an extraterrestrial foe.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: During a 1955 speech at West Point, General Douglas MacArthur told assembled cadets: "The next war will be an interplanetary war. The nations of the earth must someday make a common front against attack by people from other planets."
